{"image_analysis": "A historical military personnel record card from the 'Batalhão Limeirense' in Limeira, São Paulo. The document contains a central photograph of a soldier named Carlos Schmidt, surrounded by personal physical details (height, color, hair, beard, etc.) and administrative signatures. Handwritten annotations '4.23', '91/9', and '107-' appear in the top corners. The soldier's physical characteristics are filled in by hand (e.g., '1.76', 'branca', 'castanhos'). The document is signed at the bottom by the soldier and officials, including 'Martinho Levy' (Presidente/Prefeito) and 'Octavio Amaral Couto' (Secretario/Instructor). The text uses pre-reform Portuguese spelling (e.g., 'Commissão', 'Secção', 'azues').", "transcription": "4.23                                                                                                                                  107-
91/9

# Batalhão Limeirense

LIMEIRA — Estado de São Paulo

Altura : .......... 1.76 .......................   ![Photo: Black and white portrait of soldier Carlos Schmidt in uniform]   Olhos : ...... azues ...................

Côr : .............. branca ...................                                                                                Bocca : ...... regular .................

          | Côr: ... castanhos .......                                                                                 Rosto : ...... alongado ...............
Cabellos : |
          | Forma: . lisos ...............                                                                                 Nariz : ...... afinado .................

Barba : ........... feita ......................                                                                                Signaes : ...................................

Bigode : ......... não uso ...................

Nome : .............................. Carlos Schmidt ........................................................................

Assignatura : ........................................................................................................................................................

Reservista : ........... não ......... Carlos Schmidt .....................................................................................

      Presidente da Commissão                    Vice Presidente                        Secretario

   *MartinhoLevy*                    ____________________            *OctavioAmaralCouto*

__________________________________          ______________________          _______________________________
             Prefeito                        Delegado de Policia                      Instructor", "no_transcribable_text": false, "transcription_not_possible": false}

parsed.image_analysis: A historical military personnel record card from the 'Batalhão Limeirense' in Limeira, São Paulo. The document contains a central photograph of a soldier named Carlos Schmidt, surrounded by personal physical details (height, color, hair, beard, etc.) and administrative signatures. Handwritten annotations '4.23', '91/9', and '107-' appear in the top corners. The soldier's physical characteristics are filled in by hand (e.g., '1.76', 'branca', 'castanhos'). The document is signed at the bottom by the soldier and officials, including 'Martinho Levy' (Presidente/Prefeito) and 'Octavio Amaral Couto' (Secretario/Instructor). The text uses pre-reform Portuguese spelling (e.g., 'Commissão', 'Secção', 'azues').
